column1: #Text=Sokka says : " So where do I get something to eat ? "
#Text=Katara says : " You 're lucky enough to be one of the first outsiders to ever visit an airbender temple , and all you can think about is food ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " I 'm just a simple guy , with simple needs . "
#Text=Aang says : " So that 's where my friends and I would play airball , and over there is where the bison would sleep , and ... " Katara says : " What 's wrong ? "
#Text=Aang says : " This place used to be full of monks and lemurs and bison .
